sqlMap.select: /* notice.totalCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM NOTICE WHERE 1=1 TITLE LIKE COALESCE(#titleCond#,'%')||'%' DOMAIN_ID=CAST(#domainId# AS INTEGER)

/* notice.findByPage */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_ID,ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY $sortColumn$ $sortMethod$ ORDER BY END_DATE DESC ) as rnum FROM NOTICE WHERE 1=1 DOMAIN_ID=CAST(#domainId# AS INTEGER) TITLE LIKE COALESCE(#titleCond#,'%')||'%' ) tb1 WHERE tb1.rnum BETWEEN #startRow# AND #endRow#

/* notice.findByActive */ SELECT a.NOTICE_ID,a.IS_EMERGENCY,a.TITLE,a.START_DATE,a.END_DATE,a.TEMPLATE,a.LAYOUT_X,a.LAYOUT_Y,a.LAYOUT_WIDTH,a.LAYOUT_HEIGHT,a.PRINCIPAL_ID,a.GROUPS,a.PAGE_PATH,a.DOMAIN_ID,b.DOMAIN_NM,a.SYSTEM_CODE, 'Y' AS CUR_NOTICE_YN FROM NOTICE a LEFT OUTER JOIN DOMAIN_LANG b ON a.DOMAIN_ID=b.DOMAIN_ID AND b.LANG_KND=NVL(#langKnd#, 'ko') WHERE a.START_DATE <= (SYSDATE + 1/24) AND SYSDATE <= a.END_DATE ORDER BY a.START_DATE ASC

/* notice.detail */
SELECT a.NOTICE_ID,a.IS_EMERGENCY,a.TITLE,a.START_DATE,a.END_DATE,a.TEMPLATE,a.LAYOUT_X,a.LAYOUT_Y,a.LAYOUT_WIDTH,a.LAYOUT_HEIGHT,a.PRINCIPAL_ID,a.GROUPS,a.PAGE_PATH,a.DOMAIN_ID,b.DOMAIN_NM, a.SYSTEM_CODE, CASE WHEN (to_char(START_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') <= to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI')) AND (to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') <= to_char(a.END_DATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI')) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CUR_NOTICE_YN FROM NOTICE a LEFT OUTER JOIN DOMAIN_LANG b ON a.DOMAIN_ID=b.DOMAIN_ID AND b.LANG_KND='ko' WHERE 1=1 AND a.NOTICE_ID=#noticeId#

/* notice.formDB */ SELECT a.NOTICE_ID,a.IS_EMERGENCY,a.TITLE,a.START_DATE,a.END_DATE,a.TEMPLATE,a.LAYOUT_X,a.LAYOUT_Y,a.LAYOUT_WIDTH,a.LAYOUT_HEIGHT,a.PAGE_PATH,a.DOMAIN_ID,b.CONTENT FROM NOTICE a LEFT OUTER JOIN NOTICE_METADATA b ON a.NOTICE_ID=b.NOTICE_ID AND b.LANG_KND=NVL(#langKnd#, 'ko') WHERE 1=1 AND a.NOTICE_ID=#noticeId#

insert into notice ( notice_id , domain_id , title , layout_X , layout_y , layout_width , layout_height , is_emergency , template , principal_id , groups , system_code , page_path , start_date , end_date ) select #newNoticeId# as notice_id , domain_id , title , layout_x , layout_y , layout_width , layout_height , is_emergency , template , principal_id , groups , system_code , page_path , TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_cHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS start_date , TO_TIMESTAMP(TO_cHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS end_date from notice where notice_id = #noticeId#
